code: import{configureStore}from"@reduxjs/toolkit";import filterReducer from"./filter/slice";import cartReducer from'./cart/slice';import pizzaReducer from'./pizza/slice';import{useDispatch}from"react-redux";export const store=configureStore({reducer:{filter:filterReducer,cart:cartReducer,pizza:pizzaReducer}});export const useAppDispatch=()=>useDispatch();
